text: Angellica Bell (born 24 March 1976) is an English radio and television presenter. ==Works== She was formerly best known for as a presenter on CBBC from 2000 to 2006. She currently also is best known as an occasional reporter on The One Show and co-hosts with Martin Lewis and her ITV financial Q&A; show The Martin Lewis Money Show. Bell won the Celebrity MasterChef series of events in 2017. Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:English television presenters
title: Angellica Bell
